verses.verse: Now it happened, <WH8085> when it was reported to Sanballat <WH5571> and Tobiah, <WH2900> and to Geshem <WH1654> the Arabian, <WH6163> and to the rest <WH3499> of our enemies, <WH341> that I had built <WH1129> the wall, <WH2346> and that there was no breach <WH6556> left <WH3498> therein; <WH1571> (though even to that time <WH6256> I had not set up <WH5975> the doors <WH1817> in the gates; <WH8179>)

Then I sent <WH7971> to him, <WH559> saying, "There are <WH1961> no such things <WH1697> done <WH1961> as you say, <WH559> but you imagine <WH908> them out of your own heart. <WH3820>"

For they all would have made us afraid, <WH3372> saying, <WH559> "Their hands <WH3027> will be weakened <WH7503> from the work, <WH4399> that it not be done. <WH6213> But now, <WH2388> strengthen my hands. <WH3027>"

I went <WH935> to the house <WH1004> of Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Delaiah <WH1806> the son <WH1121> of Mehetabel, <WH4105> who was shut in <WH6113> at his home; <WH559> and he said, "Let us meet together <WH3259> in the house <WH1004> of God, <WH430> within <WH8432> the temple, <WH1964> and let us shut <WH5462> the doors <WH1817> of the temple; <WH1964> for they will come <WH935> to kill <WH2026> you; <WH3915> yes, in the night will they come <WH935> to kill you. <WH2026>"

I said, <WH559> "Should such <WH3644> a man <WH376> as I flee? <WH1272> Who is there that, <WH935> being such as I, would go into the temple <WH1964> to save his life? <WH2425> I will not go in. <WH935>"

"Remember, <WH2142> my God, <WH430> Tobiah <WH2900> and Sanballat <WH5571> according to these their works, <WH4639> and also the prophetess <WH5031> Noadiah, <WH5129> and the rest <WH3499> of the prophets, <WH5030> that would have put me in fear. <WH3372>"
